title.en: A Prayer to Lord Marpa Lotsāwa

text.en: Precious lord, true embodiment of the buddhas of the three times,
text.en-trans: jé dü sum sangye düpé ngö

text.en: Glorious Hevajra in a body of manifestation—
text.en-trans: pal gyé dzé dorjé trulpé ku

text.en: Precious lord Marpa Lotsāwa, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: jé marpa lo tsar solwa deb

text.en: Inspire me, a devoted child, with your blessings.
text.en-trans: bu nga la jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Great forefather of the lineage of the four transmissions,1
text.en-trans: gön ka zhi gyüpé chimé ché

text.en: With mastery over all aspects of mind and phenomena,
text.en-trans: chö nang sem kün la rangwang gyur

text.en: Great leader guiding an ocean of glorious adepts,
text.en-trans: pal drub rik gyatsö depön ché

text.en: Lord of Lhodrak, I recall you in the depths of my heart.
text.en-trans: gön lhodrakpa dé nying ü dren

text.en: Precious lord, seven times you travelled to the noble land of India,
text.en-trans: jé pakpé yul du len dün jön

text.en: And with a treasury of instructions from glorious Nāro and Maitrī,
text.en-trans: pal naro mitri dam dzö kyi

text.en: You, father and guru to all beings, satisfied your wisdom mind.
text.en-trans: pa drowé lamé tukgyü tsim

text.en: You distributed this treasure trove of precious jewels,
text.en-trans: chö zabmo sang ngak tekpa yi

text.en: Profound Dharma from the secret mantra vehicle,
text.en-trans: nor ratné terkha dram bur dal

text.en: And became a father to your heart-born son—
text.en-trans: pa khyé lé trungpé tuk kyi sé

text.en: Jé Mila, whose name alone serves
text.en-trans: jé mila zhepa tsen tsam gyi

text.en: To assuage the sufferings of the lower realms,
text.en-trans: ngensong gi dukngal zhidzé ching

text.en: The crowning ornament of all the adepts of Bhoṭa.2
text.en-trans: bhotra yi drubpa kün gyi gyen

text.en: Ultimate refuge, whose form is like a wish-granting gem,
text.en-trans: kyab tartuk yizhin nor dré ku

text.en: In places such as the hermitage of Trowo valley
text.en-trans: né drowo lung gi gönpa dang

text.en: And the manifest temple at glorious Sekhar,
text.en-trans: pal sékhar trulpé lhakhang na

text.en: You are the precious lord of Dharma, the heruka,
text.en-trans: jé chö kyi wangchuk heruka

text.en: Who dwells in delight with Nairātmyā.3
text.en-trans: pal dakmema dang gyé rol zhuk

text.en: And who, with oceanic tantras of definitive secret Dharma,
text.en-trans: chö ngé sang gi gyüdé gyatso yi

text.en: Matured and liberated hosts of fortunate disciple-children.
text.en-trans: bu kalzang lob tsok mindrol dzé

text.en: Precious lord who has a buddha’s mind in a human body,
text.en-trans: jé mi yi lü la sangye tuk

text.en: With your heirs, you carried out the victorious ones’ activity.
text.en-trans: gön sé ché gyalwé trinlé dzé

text.en: If only you were here right now, how happy I would be!
text.en-trans: dü danta zhuk na gawa la

text.en: But I am bereft, O protector, with no chance to see your face—
text.en-trans: gön khyö zhal jalwé kalwé wen

text.en: A child of evil karma mired in the fault of obscurations.
text.en-trans: bu lé ngen dribpé nyepar zé

text.en: O Father, as you dwell in the dharmadhātu,
text.en-trans: pa chö kyi ying na zhuk zhindu

text.en: The play of nirmāṇakāya and sambhogakāya forms continues,
text.en-trans: zuk long trul gyi rolpa gyün mi ché

text.en: Leading infinite assemblies, pure and impure,
text.en-trans: khor dak dang ma dak talé nam

text.en: To the fruitional state of great awakening.
text.en-trans: dré changchub chenpö sa la gö

text.en: Precious lord, your activity is as pervasive as space itself.
text.en-trans: jé khyö kyi trinlé kha tar khyab

text.en: You brought the light of purity to the benighted land of Tibet.
text.en-trans: bö münpé gyalkham karpor tong

text.en: And with innumerable mantra adepts and vidyādharas
text.en-trans: ngak rigdzin drubpa sam lé dé

text.en: Spread the teachings of the glorious practice lineage throughout the world.
text.en-trans: pal drubgyü tenpé dzamling khyab

text.en: O protector, no other life of liberation can compare to yours.
text.en-trans: gön khyö dré namtar zhen lamé

text.en: You who are inseparable from glorious Saraha,
text.en-trans: pal sara ha dang yermé pé

text.en: Great father translator, I recall your kindness.
text.en-trans: pa lo tsa chenpö kadrin dren

text.en: You who reached the peak of the thirteen stages,
text.en-trans: sa chusum tsemor rab chinpé

text.en: Glorious Vajradhara with the seven aspects of union,
text.en-trans: pal yenlak dünden dorjé chang

text.en: Who manifested perfectly in an ordinary form,
text.en-trans: ku tamal gyi nampar rab tenpa

text.en: Great lord of Lhodrak, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jé lho drak chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Your body has the majestic splendour of a hundred suns,
text.en-trans: ku nyima gyapé ziji dang

text.en: Your speech resounds with the melodious tones of Dharma,
text.en-trans: sung chö kyi drayang u ru ru

text.en: And your mind is profound peace, bliss-emptiness, great luminosity—
text.en-trans: tuk zab zhi dé tong ösal ché

text.en: O Father, the blessings of your three secrets are beyond compare.
text.en-trans: pa sang sum gyi jinlab tsungda dral

text.en: If I can supplicate you with devotion,
text.en-trans: dak mögü kyi solwa deb nü na

text.en: I trust that you, precious lord, will not fail me.
text.en-trans: jé tuk kyi ngepar mi tong nyam

text.en: Now is the time for patrimonial blessings
text.en-trans: bu dak la jinlab kyi pa pok dé

text.en: To be imparted to me, child that I am.
text.en-trans: dü danta nyi du tsol ré ren

text.en: Turn this stubborn mind of mine toward the path of liberation;
text.en-trans: lo drepo tarpé lam la gyur

text.en: Tear apart the web of clinging to appearances as real;
text.en-trans: nang dendzin drawa hrulpo shik

text.en: Let the constructs of dualistic perception cease within basic space;
text.en-trans: chö zungdzin gyi tröpa ying su zhi

text.en: Allow me to sustain, at all times without interruption
text.en-trans: sem rigpa kyemé ösal dé

text.en: The clear light of mind’s own unborn awareness;
text.en-trans: dü gyünché mepar taktu kyang

text.en: Cause all sensory perceptions to be freed, just as they are;
text.en-trans: nga tsok druk gi nangwa rang sar drol

text.en: And make me your equal, O precious lord, in wisdom intent.
text.en-trans: jé khyö dang gongpa nyampar shok
